items.title: Polygon Lands Its First Live Share Registry
items.description: BeToken’s live STO on Polygon turns real Spanish equity into tradable ERC-3643 tokens, setting a precedent for compliant RWA markets across the EU.

items.title: Tractor Supply’s Improving Big-Ticket Sales Drives Wall Street And Retail Investor Optimism
items.description: Tractor Supply beat second-quarter revenue estimates and witnessed strength in big-ticket merchandise sales, according to Wall Street analysts.
